metadata.title: CVE-2023-20938 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In binder_transaction_buffer_release of binder.c, there is a possible useafter free due to improper input validation. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-257685302References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-72-generic - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-5.15.0-72-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-72-generic - 5.15.0-72.79
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-72-generic-64k - 5.15.0-72.79
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-72.79').
